Keywords: Detective , Robot , Sentinel , X-Men
Real Name: Karima Shapandar
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: ROBOT THEMED TEAM: When establishing themed teams, friendly characters with the Robot keyword gain the Sentinel keyword. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
02
TEAM UP: MARAUDERS THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Karima is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] Has the Marauders keyword. If 3+ friendly characters with the Marauders keyword are on the map, Karima and listed friendly characters can use Poison, but only to deal damage to characters with the X-Men keyword. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
TARGETING: Elevated, Hindering, Characters
TAILORED BIO BLASTS: When Karima hits, hit targets can't use STOP this turn and you may choose a standard attack power. She can use that power until she chooses again.
RAY SHIELDED: Energy Shield/Deflection.
